summary: This document contains details of money transfers involving Jeffrey Epstein and an individual named Eric Epstein. It includes information about the amounts transferred, sender and receiver details, and mentions the use of Western Union for these transactions. The document is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the receiver of funds in two separate money transfers detailed in the document.

persons.name: Eric Epstein
persons.context: Eric Epstein is identified as the sender of funds in two separate money transfers detailed in the document.

connections.description: Eric Epstein is sending money to Jeffrey Epstein through Western Union.

events.title: Money Transfer
events.description: A money transfer of $100.00 was sent from Eric Epstein to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Money Transfer
events.description: A money transfer of $75.00 was sent from Eric Epstein to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document details two money transfers from Eric Epstein to Jeffrey Epstein.
The first transfer was for $100.00 and occurred on October 3, 2005.
The second transfer was for $75.00 and occurred on October 19, 2005.
Both transactions were processed through Western Union.
The document is subject to a protective order, limiting its disclosure.
